Html:
I've downloaded the source and I'd like to figure out how to add all of the tests to a VMDI file.

Apparently Kigg uses Xunit and Xunit isn't compatible with MSTest. Correct?

Is there an easy way to convert from Xunit to MSTest?

I know I can run the Xunit tests as part of a Team build using:http://jonnekats.wordpress.com/2009/05/07/integrate-xunit-tests-into-your-daily-team-build/

But this is a hack and I'd like to demonstrate KIGG working with Test edition of VSTS.

How do I take the existing tests and put the into a test list?

Thanks for the help.

I don't know if any straight forward way to do that. But you might copy the classes and start modify them. Maybe do Replace all such as [Fact] to [TestMethod] etc...

Just because of time I couldn't port test to VSTS tests.
I think we need to support have the support for VWD as MsTest is only available from VS Pro. @Ianceicys Would you pls post this issue in xunit.codeplex.com.
